channel.title: A simple backup program coded from Ms-Dos?
channel.description: I was wondering if sum1 could make me a program out of Ms-Dos that when you click the file, it makes a new folder called backup and copy and pastes all ur files into it?

item.title: A simple backup program coded from Ms-Dos?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Lol my backup program was so worth making… So easy… One click and it saves me 30 seconds. So ya, it’s not really lazy stupid… It’s a good thing. -.-
